SEARCH
Module com.dua3.license
Package com.dua3.license

Class License

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.license.License
public final class License extends Object
Represents a License with associated metadata and functionality for validation and processing. The License class provides mfunctionality load, validate, and manage license data, supporting cryptographic operations such as signing and signature verification.

  • Field Details

    • LICENSE_ID_LICENSE_FIELD

      public static final String LICENSE_ID_LICENSE_FIELD
      Represents the field name for the unique identifier of a license. This constant is used as a key to access the license ID within a license object or during license-related operations.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • LICENSEE_LICENSE_FIELD

      public static final String LICENSEE_LICENSE_FIELD
      Represents the field name for the licensee name. This constant is used as a key to access the licensee name within a license object or during license-related operations.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • SIGNATURE_LICENSE_FIELD

      public static final String SIGNATURE_LICENSE_FIELD
      A constant representing the field name for the digital signature in the license data. This field is used to reference the digital signature associated with the license.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • ISSUE_DATE_LICENSE_FIELD

      public static final String ISSUE_DATE_LICENSE_FIELD
      Represents the field key used to store or retrieve the issue date of the license from a data structure or input. This constant is used to reference the license issue date in the license.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • VALID_UNTIL_LICENSE_FIELD

      public static final String VALID_UNTIL_LICENSE_FIELD
      Represents the field name used to access the last date the license is valid.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • REQUIRED_LICENSE_FIELDS

      public static final List<String> REQUIRED_LICENSE_FIELDS
      Define the list of fields that have to be present in every license.

    • MIN_VERSION_LICENSE_FIELD

      public static final String MIN_VERSION_LICENSE_FIELD
      Represents the key for the minimum version required by the license. This field is used to specify the earliest version of software or system that the license is compatible with.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • MAX_VERSION_LICENSE_FIELD

      public static final String MAX_VERSION_LICENSE_FIELD
      Represents the key for the maximum version supported by the license. This field is used to specify the last version of software or system that the license is compatible with.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • createLicense

      public static SequencedMap<String,Object> createLicense(Class<? extends Enum> licenseFieldsEnum, Map<String,Object> licenseData, Function<byte[],byte[]> signer) throws LicenseException
      Creates a license with the specified license fields and data, signs it with the provided key, and writes it to the output stream.
      Parameters:
      licenseFieldsEnum - the enum class defining the license fields
      licenseData - the license data
      signer - the signing function
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable sequenced map containing the signed license data
      Throws:
      LicenseException - if an error occurs

    • prepareSigningData

      public static byte[] prepareSigningData(Map<?,?> data)
      Prepares the data for signing.
      Parameters:
      data - the license data
      Returns:
      the data to be signed as a byte array

    • createLicense

      public static SequencedMap<String,Object> createLicense(DynamicEnum licenseFieldsEnum, Map<String,Object> licenseData, Function<byte[],byte[]> signer)
      Creates a license with the specified license fields and data, signs it with the provided key, and writes it to the output stream.
      Parameters:
      licenseFieldsEnum - the dynamic enum defining the license fields
      licenseData - the license data
      signer - the signing function
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable sequenced map containing the signed license data

    • load

      public static License load(Class<? extends Enum<?>> keyClass, SequencedMap<String,Object> licenseData, Certificate... trustedRoots) throws LicenseException
      Loads a license from a sequenced map containing the license data.
      Parameters:
      keyClass - the enum class defining the keys used in the license
      licenseData - the map containing the license data
      trustedRoots - the trusted root certificates
      Returns:
      a License instance created using the provided properties and public key
      Throws:
      LicenseException - if a problem occurs while loading or processing the license

    • getLicenseText

      public Optional<String> getLicenseText()
      Retrieves the license text associated with this instance.
      Returns:
      an Optional holding the license text, or an empty Optional if it is not set

    • getLicenseId

      public String getLicenseId()
      Retrieves the license ID stored in the license data.
      Returns:
      the license ID as a string, or null if the license ID is not set

    • getSignature

      public String getSignature()
      Retrieves the signature information stored in the license data.
      Returns:
      the signature as a string, or null if no signature is associated

    • getIssueDate

      public LocalDate getIssueDate()
      Retrieves the issue date of the license.
      Returns:
      the issue date as a LocalDate, or null if the issue date is not defined in the license data

    • getMinVersion

      public com.dua3.utility.lang.Version getMinVersion()
      Retrieves the minimum version specified in the license data.
      Returns:
      the minimum version as a Version object

    • getMaxVersion

      public com.dua3.utility.lang.Version getMaxVersion()
      Retrieves the maximum version specified in the license data.
      Returns:
      the maximum version as a Version object

    • validate

      public boolean validate(Certificate[] trustedRoots, com.dua3.utility.lang.Version currentVersion, Appendable validationOutput)
      Validates the license using the provided keystore, password, and version information. The method checks the license data against the keystore and writes any validation messages to the provided output.
      Parameters:
      trustedRoots - the trusted root certificates
      currentVersion - the current version of the application for version compatibility checks
      validationOutput - an appendable instance to which validation messages will be written
      Returns:
      true if the license is valid, false otherwise

    • validate

      public static boolean validate(Map<String,Object> licenseData, Certificate[] trustedRoots, @Nullable com.dua3.utility.lang.Version currentVersion, Appendable validationOutput)
      Validates a license from license data.
      Parameters:
      licenseData - the license data to validate
      trustedRoots - the trusted root certificates
      currentVersion - the current version of the application for version compatibility checks
      validationOutput - appendable to write validation messages to
      Returns:
      true if the license is valid, false otherwise

    • getUnsignedLicenseData

      public static byte[] getUnsignedLicenseData(Map<String,Object> licenseData)
      Extracts the unsigned license data by removing the signature field from the provided license data map and converting the remaining map to a UTF-8 encoded byte array. This method is used to prepare the license data for verification processes.
      Parameters:
      licenseData - a map containing the license data, which includes signed data and associated metadata
      Returns:
      a byte array representing the unsigned license data in UTF-8 encoding

    • validDays

      public int validDays()
      Calculates the number of valid days remaining until the license expires.

      The method computes the difference in days between the current date and the expiry date of the license. If the expiry date is in the past, it returns a number less than or equal to zero.

      Returns:
      the number of valid days remaining, or a non-positive number if the license is expired

    • getValidUntil

      public LocalDate getValidUntil()
      Retrieves the expiry date of the license.
      Returns:
      the expiry date as a LocalDate

    • getLicenseData

      public com.dua3.utility.application.LicenseData getLicenseData()
      Retrieves the license data associated with the current context.
      Returns:
      an instance of LicenseData containing details such as licensee information, validity period, license ID, and the license text if available.
